analysis.description:
Pixiu.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#419-440) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Pixiu.tokenExchangeRateInWei

ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#56-63) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#58)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#66-75) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#68-69)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#69)

BasicToken (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#75-111) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#91-98)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#119-171) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#126-139)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#145-156)

Pixiu (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#171-709) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#607-664)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#664-685)

Pixiu.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#419-440) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nowTime >= time1 && nowTime <= time2 (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#434-438)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.9 (/unique_chucks/23/0x3f4dd010fbbc9a9b6d95f1f53837d7e9f3befac8.sol#1): it allows old versions
